attributes.action: Allow my wife back into the country (and admit the Home Office's) wrongdoings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In February this year, I married a girl from Peru.  After this, we were told by the UK Home Ofice that we needed to apply for a visa to allow her to remain in the country.  When we did this (at a cost of £335), the Home Office said that my wife didn't have a current valid visa snd would have to return to her country.  So, because of their error, she had to leave me.

She moved back 3 weeks ago and i have struggled to cope since then due to my health problems.  My wife will be away for what could be about a year whilst she saves enough money to return.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
